attributes.action: Promise that the individual taxpayer is entitled to decide which political party receives his/her contribution if public funding takes place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been some discussion regarding funding of political parties. The present system causes suspicion that wealthy people & organisations have undue influence. Public funding may be an alternative but only if the taxpayer decides where the money goes, & not if existing parties carve up the pot to maintain their own position and deprive small or new parties they condider "unworthy"
